snippet.title: PixelJunk Monsters Duo on Kickstarter!
snippet.description:
ATTENTION!

We are thrilled to announce the return of PixelJunk Monsters!
PixelJunk Monsters Duo is headed to Android and iOS but we need your help! We have launched a Kickstarter campaign to make this happen! We can do this!


Pledge now:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/q-games/pixeljunktm-monsters-duo-mobile-game


Be sure to follow us on social media too!
https://twitter.com/pixeljunknews
https://www.facebook.com/pixeljunkmonsters/
